oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Beth and Danny Davenport Oral History Interview, 2011 April 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Beth and Danny Davenport, conducted on 16 April 2011 by Lexi Koczanski as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. The Davenports received supplies from a helicopter during the May 2010 flood since their neighborhood was surrounded by water.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
